TRUE REVIEW: This is actually a really good quality cam. There was only one scene where things were too dark to tell what was happening but from the sounds, it wasn't anything important. The camera doesn't shake and there are no annoying heads in the way. The sound quality is about a 7 out of a 10 because it is a cam. As for the movie itself, I personally enjoyed it for the action, T&A and mild, dark humor. I look forward to a sequel.

Of course people have DVDs of movies that are not released yet. Likely they are review copies distributed to people for judging and what not. Any movie that is shown at a film festival likely has a DVD that was circulated as well.
